\index{load\_cfg() (lwautils.lwa\_arx.ARX method)@\spxentry{load\_cfg()}\spxextra{lwautils.lwa\_arx.ARX method}}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{index:lwautils.lwa_arx.ARX.load_cfg}}\pysiglinewithargsret{\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{load\_cfg}}}{\emph{arx\_addr: int}, \emph{loc: int}}{{ $\rightarrow$ str}}
Load config from stored memory location.
\begin{quote}\begin{description}
\item[{Parameters}] \leavevmode\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{arx\_addr}} \textendash{} ARX board address.

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{loc}} \textendash{} Memory location. Allowed: 0,1 or 2.

\end{itemize}

\item[{Returns}] \leavevmode
Empty string for no errors.

\end{description}\end{quote}

\index{set\_all\_chan\_cfg() (lwautils.lwa\_arx.ARX method)@\spxentry{set\_all\_chan\_cfg()}\spxextra{lwautils.lwa\_arx.ARX method}}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{index:lwautils.lwa_arx.ARX.set_all_chan_cfg}}\pysiglinewithargsret{\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{set\_all\_chan\_cfg}}}{\emph{arx\_addr}, \emph{chan: int}}{}
Sends configuration defined for ‘chan’ to all channels on the ARX board.

\begin{sphinxadmonition}{note}{Note:}
Sends the internal channel configuration to all channels
on the specified ARX board.
Changing the internal configuration can be done using the other
\sphinxtitleref{set\_chan\_cfg\_} functions.
\end{sphinxadmonition}
\begin{quote}\begin{description}
\item[{Parameters}] \leavevmode\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{arx\_addr}} \textendash{} ARX board address.

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{chan}} \textendash{} Configuration to send

\end{itemize}

\item[{Raises}] \leavevmode
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{ArxException}} \textendash{} Any ARX errors.

\end{description}\end{quote}


\sphinxstrong{See also:}


{\hyperref[\detokenize{index:lwautils.lwa_arx.ARX.set_all_different_chan_cfg}]{\sphinxcrossref{\sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{set\_all\_different\_chan\_cfg()}}}}}, {\hyperref[\detokenize{index:lwautils.lwa_arx.ARX.set_chan_cfg}]{\sphinxcrossref{\sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{set\_chan\_cfg()}}}}}, {\hyperref[\detokenize{index:lwautils.lwa_arx.ARX.set_chan_cfg_input_dc_pwr_off}]{\sphinxcrossref{\sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{set\_chan\_cfg\_input\_dc\_pwr\_off()}}}}}, {\hyperref[\detokenize{index:lwautils.lwa_arx.ARX.set_chan_cfg_input_dc_pwr_on}]{\sphinxcrossref{\sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{set\_chan\_cfg\_input\_dc\_pwr\_on()}}}}}, {\hyperref[\detokenize{index:lwautils.lwa_arx.ARX.set_chan_cfg_lowpass_narrow}]{\sphinxcrossref{\sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{set\_chan\_cfg\_lowpass\_narrow()}}}}}, {\hyperref[\detokenize{index:lwautils.lwa_arx.ARX.set_chan_cfg_lowpass_wide}]{\sphinxcrossref{\sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{set\_chan\_cfg\_lowpass\_wide()}}}}}, {\hyperref[\detokenize{index:lwautils.lwa_arx.ARX.set_chan_cfg_highpass_narrow}]{\sphinxcrossref{\sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{set\_chan\_cfg\_highpass\_narrow()}}}}}, \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{set\_chan\_cfg\_highpass()}}, {\hyperref[\detokenize{index:lwautils.lwa_arx.ARX.set_chan_cfg_first_atten}]{\sphinxcrossref{\sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{set\_chan\_cfg\_first\_atten()}}}}}, {\hyperref[\detokenize{index:lwautils.lwa_arx.ARX.set_chan_cfg_second_atten}]{\sphinxcrossref{\sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{set\_chan\_cfg\_second\_atten()}}}}}, {\hyperref[\detokenize{index:lwautils.lwa_arx.ARX.show_chan_cfg}]{\sphinxcrossref{\sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{show\_chan\_cfg()}}}}}

\index{set\_all\_different\_chan\_cfg() (lwautils.lwa\_arx.ARX method)@\spxentry{set\_all\_different\_chan\_cfg()}\spxextra{lwautils.lwa\_arx.ARX method}}

Sends all configurations defined for each channel to the ARX board.

\begin{sphinxadmonition}{note}{Note:}
Sends the internal channel configurations to the ARX board.
Each channel can have a different configuration.
Changing the internal configuration can be done using the other
\sphinxtitleref{set\_chan\_cfg\_} functions.
\end{sphinxadmonition}

\end{itemize}

\end{description}\end{quote}

This function only manipulates the local configuration.
Use set\_chan\_config() to send to ARX board.
\end{sphinxadmonition}

\begin{sphinxadmonition}{note}{Note:}

Use set\_chan\_config() to send to ARX board.
\end{sphinxadmonition}
\begin{quote}\begin{description}
\item[{Parameters}] \leavevmode
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{chan}} \textendash{} Channel number. 0 indexed.

\end{description}\end{quote}


\sphinxstrong{See also:}

\end{fulllineitems}

\end{itemize}

\index{show\_chan\_cfg() (lwautils.lwa\_arx.ARX method)@\spxentry{show\_chan\_cfg()}\spxextra{lwautils.lwa\_arx.ARX method}}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{index:lwautils.lwa_arx.ARX.show_chan_cfg}}\pysiglinewithargsret{\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{show\_chan\_cfg}}}{\emph{chan: int}, \emph{verbose: bool = False}, \emph{cfg: int = None}}{}
Show the binary representation of the channel configuration.
\begin{quote}\begin{description}
\item[{Parameters}] \leavevmode\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{chan}} \textendash{} ARX channel number. 0 indexed.

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{verbose}} \textendash{} True to print out bit definitions.

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{cfg}} \textendash{} 16b integer representation of channel configuration.
If None, then internal configuration is shown.

\end{itemize}

\item[{Raises}] \leavevmode
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{ArxException}} \textendash{} Any ARX errors.

\end{description}\end{quote}

\begin{sphinxadmonition}{note}{Note:}
Bit definitions for 16bit configuration integer.

b0 = lowpass filter (1=wide, 0=narrow)

b1 = signal on when b1 == b0. off otherwise

b2 = highpass filter (1=wide, 0=narrow)

b3:b8 = first attenuation (inverted) in steps of 0.5dB. Max=63(31.5dB)

b9:b14 = second attenuation (inverted) in steps of 0.5dB Max=63(31.5dB)

b15 = dc power state (1=on, 0=off)
\end{sphinxadmonition}


\sphinxstrong{See also:}


{\hyperref[\detokenize{index:lwautils.lwa_arx.ARX.get_chan_cfg}]{\sphinxcrossref{\sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{get\_chan\_cfg()}}}}}



\end{fulllineitems}


\end{fulllineitems}
